name: Shadow Dragon Wyrmling
description: The Shadow Dragon Wyrmling is a medium-sized dragon that embodies traits of darkness and malevolence, displaying scale colors that blend into shadows.
memorable: Radiates an aura of evil; possesses unique essence abilities tied to a specific area.
goals: To dominate its territory and manipulate creatures entering its essence-linked area.
relations: Related to other dragons and creatures of the shadows; may serve larger shadow entities.
environment: Typically found near dark, secluded areas or locations with a strong connection to shadow energy.
strengths: Immunities to necrotic and poison damage, resistance to multiple damage types, exceptional stealth capabilities.
attacks: Uses a powerful bite attack and a devastating Anguished Breath weapon that inflicts necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Anguished Breath, which unleashes a cone of shadowy energy causing significant necrotic damage.
senses: Possesses darkvision up to 120 feet, enhancing its effectiveness in low-light environments.
skills: Excels in deception and stealth, making it a master of sneaky tactics and manipulation.
additional_information: Incorporeal Movement allows it to pass through objects.
Essence Link ties its fate to a specific location.
Aura of evil can influence the morale of nearby creatures.
Immunities to several conditions enhance its combat resilience.
Resistance to nonmagical weapon damage improves its durability.
